description: Infosys can develop an AI-powered content generation model that can create personalized content for customer data platforms. The model can analyze customer behavior, preferences, and interests to create customized content that can increase customer engagement and loyalty. This can help Infosys clients improve customer insights and create targeted marketing campaigns.
